The reconciler of the Bible inlarged wherein above three thousand seeming contradictions throughout the Old and New Testament are fully and plainly reconciled ... / by J.T. and T.M. ... Thaddaeus, Joannes, fl. 1630. T. M.
[8], 132 p.
Printed for Simon Miller ..., London : 1662.
Attributed by Wing to Joannes Thaddaeus. First edition published in 1656. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
